mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_NUMBER, c.CUST_NUMBER, c.PROD_NUMBER, p.PROD_NAME AS prod_name, p.PRICE, p.DISCOUNT, c.QUANTITY AS quantity, p.IMG_1 FROM CART c JOIN PRODUCT p ON c.PROD_NUMBER = p.PROD_NUMBER WHERE c.CUST_NUMBER = #{_parameter} ORDER BY c.CART_NUMBER DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NUMBER, CUST_NUMBER, PROD_NUMBER, QUANTITY) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cust_number}, #{prod_number}, #{quantity})
